verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* consenting \w unto|strong="G4909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w death|strong="G0336"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w time|strong="G2250"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w persecution|strong="G1375"\w* \w against|strong="G1909"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* which \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w* they \w were|strong="G1289"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* scattered \w abroad|strong="G1289"\w* \w throughout|strong="G2596"\w* the \w regions|strong="G5561"\w* of \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Samaria|strong="G4540"\w*, \w except|strong="G4133"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w devout|strong="G2126"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w carried|strong="G4792"\w* \w Stephen|strong="G4736"\w* \add to his burial\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w lamentation|strong="G2870"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w As|strong="G1161"\w* for \w Saul|strong="G4569"\w*, he made \w havock|strong="G3075"\w* of the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, entering \w into|strong="G1531"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w haling|strong="G4951"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w* \w committed|strong="G3860"\w* \add them\add* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* that were scattered \w abroad|strong="G1289"\w* went every \w where|strong="G1330"\w* \w preaching|strong="G2097"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* went \w down|strong="G2718"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="G4540"\w*, and \w preached|strong="G2784"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* one \w accord|strong="G3661"\w* gave \w heed|strong="G4337"\w* \w unto|strong="G5259"\w* those \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w which|strong="G3004"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* \w spake|strong="G3004"\w*, \w hearing|strong="G0191"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seeing|strong="G0991"\w* the \w miracles|strong="G4592"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w did|strong="G4160"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*, \w crying|strong="G0994"\w* with \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, came \w out|strong="G1831"\w* of \w many|strong="G4183"\w* that were \w possessed|strong="G2192"\w* \add with them\add*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* taken with \w palsies|strong="G3886"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that \w were|strong="G2323"\w* \w lame|strong="G5560"\w*, were \w healed|strong="G2323"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w city|strong="G4172"\w*.

But there \w was|strong="G1161"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \w called|strong="G3686"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*, which \w beforetime|strong="G4391"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the same \w city|strong="G4172"\w* used \w sorcery|strong="G3096"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bewitched|strong="G1839"\w* the \w people|strong="G1484"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="G4540"\w*, giving out \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w was|strong="G1511"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* great \w one|strong="G3173"\w*:

To \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they \w all|strong="G3956"\w* gave \w heed|strong="G4337"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w least|strong="G3398"\w* \w to|strong="G2193"\w* the \w greatest|strong="G3173"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, This \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* they had \w regard|strong="G4337"\w*, because \w that|strong="G1223"\w* of \w long|strong="G2425"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* he had \w bewitched|strong="G1839"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* with \w sorceries|strong="G3095"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* they \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* \w preaching|strong="G2097"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, they were \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*, \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*, he \w continued|strong="G4342"\w* with \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w wondered|strong="G1839"\w*, \w beholding|strong="G2334"\w* the \w miracles|strong="G1411"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* which were \w done|strong="G1096"\w*.

Now \w when|strong="G1161"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* which \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Samaria|strong="G4540"\w* had \w received|strong="G1209"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, they \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3748"\w*, when they were come \w down|strong="G2597"\w*, \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3704"\w* they might \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*:

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* as \w yet|strong="G3768"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w fallen|strong="G1968"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w only|strong="G3440"\w* they \w were|strong="G5225"\w* \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.)

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* laid \w they|strong="G2007"\w* \add their\add* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w received|strong="G2983"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G0040"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w saw|strong="G2300"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* laying \w on|strong="G1936"\w* of the \w apostles’|strong="G0652"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* was \w given|strong="G1325"\w*, he \w offered|strong="G4374"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w money|strong="G5536"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Give \w me|strong="G1325"\w* \w also|strong="G2504"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* on \w whomsoever|strong="G3739"\w* I \w lay|strong="G2007"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*, he may \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w money|strong="G0694"\w* \w perish|strong="G0684"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* thou hast \w thought|strong="G3543"\w* \w that|strong="G1223"\w* the \w gift|strong="G1431"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* may be \w purchased|strong="G2932"\w* with \w money|strong="G5536"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="G4671"\w* \w hast|strong="G2076"\w* \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w part|strong="G3310"\w* \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w lot|strong="G2819"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w matter|strong="G3056"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w right|strong="G2117"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Repent|strong="G3340"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w wickedness|strong="G2549"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pray|strong="G1189"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w perhaps|strong="G0686"\w* the \w thought|strong="G1963"\w* of \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* may be \w forgiven|strong="G0863"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w perceive|strong="G3708"\w* that \w thou|strong="G4571"\w* \w art|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w gall|strong="G5521"\w* of \w bitterness|strong="G4088"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add in\add* the \w bond|strong="G4886"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="G0093"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Pray|strong="G1189"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*, \w that|strong="G3704"\w* none of these \w things|strong="G3367"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* ye have \w spoken|strong="G2046"\w* \w come|strong="G1904"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w*.

\w And|strong="G3767"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w*, when they had \w testified|strong="G1263"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w preached|strong="G2980"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w returned|strong="G5290"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* preached the \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w* in \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w villages|strong="G2968"\w* of the \w Samaritans|strong="G4541"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Arise|strong="G0450"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w toward|strong="G2596"\w* the \w south|strong="G3314"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* goeth \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Gaza|strong="G1048"\w*, \w which|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w desert|strong="G2048"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w arose|strong="G0450"\w* and \w went|strong="G4198"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Ethiopia|strong="G0128"\w*, an \w eunuch|strong="G2135"\w* of great \w authority|strong="G1413"\w* under \w Candace|strong="G2582"\w* \w queen|strong="G0938"\w* of the \w Ethiopians|strong="G0128"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G2258"\w* the charge \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w treasure|strong="G1047"\w*, and had \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* for to \w worship|strong="G4352"\w*,

\w Was|strong="G2258"\w* \w returning|strong="G5290"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w chariot|strong="G0716"\w* \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \w Esaias|strong="G2268"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w*, Go \w near|strong="G4334"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* join \w thyself|strong="G2853"\w* to \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w chariot|strong="G0716"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* ran \w thither|strong="G4370"\w* to \add him\add*, and \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w read|strong="G0314"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w Esaias|strong="G2268"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, Understandest \w thou|strong="G1097"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* thou \w readest|strong="G0314"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w How|strong="G4459"\w* can \w I|strong="G1410"\w*, \w except|strong="G1437"\w* some \w man|strong="G5100"\w* should \w guide|strong="G3594"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*? \w And|strong="G5037"\w* he \w desired|strong="G3870"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* that he would come \w up|strong="G0305"\w* and \w sit|strong="G2523"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

The \w place|strong="G4042"\w* of the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, He was \w led|strong="G0071"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w sheep|strong="G4263"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w slaughter|strong="G4967"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* a \w lamb|strong="G0286"\w* \w dumb|strong="G0880"\w* \w before|strong="G1726"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w shearer|strong="G2751"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* opened \w he|strong="G0455"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*:

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w humiliation|strong="G5014"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* was taken \w away|strong="G0142"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* shall \w declare|strong="G1334"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w generation|strong="G1074"\w*? \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* is \w taken|strong="G0142"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w eunuch|strong="G2135"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, I \w pray|strong="G1189"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*, \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w whom|strong="G5101"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G3004"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*? \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* other \w man|strong="G2087"\w*?

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* \w at|strong="G0575"\w* the \w same|strong="G3778"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w*, and \w preached|strong="G2097"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* they \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w on|strong="G2596"\w* \add their\add* \w way|strong="G3598"\w*, they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w eunuch|strong="G2135"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \w See|strong="G2400"\w*, \add here is\add* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*; \w what|strong="G5101"\w* doth \w hinder|strong="G2967"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* to be \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* thou \w believest|strong="G4100"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* thine \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, thou \w mayest|strong="G1832"\w*. And he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, I \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* that \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w is|strong="G1511"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* the \w chariot|strong="G0716"\w* to stand \w still|strong="G2476"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they went \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w both|strong="G0297"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w eunuch|strong="G2135"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* they were come \w up|strong="G0305"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* caught \w away|strong="G0726"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w*, \w that|strong="G2532"\w* the \w eunuch|strong="G2135"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* no \w more|strong="G3765"\w*: \w and|strong="G1063"\w* he \w went|strong="G4198"\w* on \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="G5463"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* was \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Azotus|strong="G0108"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* passing \w through|strong="G1330"\w* he \w preached|strong="G2097"\w* in \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w cities|strong="G4172"\w*, \w till|strong="G2193"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Cæsarea|strong="G2542"\w*.
